attributes.action: free corrective teeth treatment and braces for all children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: children should recieve free corrective treatment for their teeth as this will affect the rest of their lives, confidents,bullying,and problems with gum diesease & tooth decay,parents on a low income like myself,we want the best for our children,but cannot afford the very high prices of minimal corrective treatment at 2-3 thosand pound.why should our children have to suffer a life of imperfection and afraid to smile.all braces and corrective treatment should be free for children.
